title: Wombat poop is cube-shaped!
content: Wombats, native to Australia, have uniquely structured intestines that shape their poop into little cubes . This unusual shape helps the poop stay in place , marking their territory and reducing the chances of it rolling away !

title: In possible peace negotiations: majority of Ukrainians now support ceding territory
content: Ex-NATO chief Jens Stoltenberg said on Tuesday what had probably been discussed behind closed doors for some time: One option for an agreement between Ukraine and Russia could be to hand over the occupied territories to Russia for the time being. Later, at least according to theory, Ukraine will get its land back . Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyj also recently expressed his willingness to place the country, which was occupied in violation of international law, under Russian control until it is regained through diplomatic means.

title: Octopuses have three hearts!
content: Did you know that octopuses have three hearts ? Two pump blood to the gills , while the third pumps it to the rest of the body . Interestingly, when an octopus swims, the heart that delivers blood to the body stops beating , which is one reason why they prefer crawling over swimming—it’s less tiring for them!

title: “Potentially dangerous”: Two huge asteroids are racing past Earth today
content: Two large asteroids, 447755 (2007 JX2) and 2020 XR, are set to pass by Earth in the coming days . Both, from the asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter , are roughly 380 and 365 meters in diameter, similar to the size of the Empire State Building . 2007 JX2 passes on December 3rd at 5.5 million kilometers, while 2020 XR follows on December 4th at 2.2 million kilometers. Classified as "potentially dangerous" by NASA , these objects are at least 140 meters wide and come within 7.5 million kilometers of Earth. NASA tracks around 36,000 near-Earth objects, 2,350 of which are deemed potentially hazardous.

title: A fluffy-looking cloud weighs around a million pounds!
content: Despite their light and airy appearance, clouds are composed of countless tiny droplets of water and air , giving them a combined mass equivalent to about 100 elephants . This incredible weight is distributed across a vast area, making it imperceptible to us on the ground​.

question: Which country has more than 8,000 islands?

title: UnitedHealthcare CEO Targeted in NYC Shooting Amid Rising Tensions
content: UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson was shot outside a New York City hotel on December 4 before an investor meeting. Authorities believe the attack was targeted, with the bullet inscribed "Deny" and "Depose." The shooter remains at large and has gained widespread support on social media, complicating efforts to locate them. The incident highlights growing tensions between the public and corporate leaders, prompting other CEOs to adopt more customer-friendly actions. For example, McDonald’s CEO announced the return of the popular Snack Wrap. This attack underscores rising security risks for executives amidst mounting public scrutiny.

title: The Reopening of Notre-Dame: A Monumental Achievement
content: After five years of restoration , Notre-Dame Cathedral in Paris has been fully restored and reopens to the public . Enhanced by meticulous craftsmanship, the cathedral's new features, such as the blond stone and bronze furnishings, provide a renewed sense of light and life, offering a space for prayer and reflection. The successful reopening is a result of a collective effort involving the Church, the State, patrons, artisans, and businesses, demonstrating the power of unity and determination in overcoming challenges.
